var multimediaGallery3051 = { "props": { "defaultGallery": true, "imageWidth" : 960, "imageHeight" : 500, "pageModuleInstanceId": "3051", "moduleInstanceId": "3024", "virtualFolderPath": "/cms/lib/NY50000157/Centricity/ModuleInstance/3024/" }, "records": [ { "flexDataId": "8629", "hideTitle": "False", "title": "Guy Thomas", "hideCaption": "False", "caption": "Guy is a 2016 Brewster graduate.
He is currently attending New York University and is majoring in Global Public Health and Biology. He is the VP of Administration for NYU's Senior Class Activities Board.
When Guy graduates in May 2020, he will continue his education at the University of Minnesota where he plans to pursue a Masters of Public Health and Epidemiology. He hopes to go to medical school and become an Infectious Disease Specialist.", "imageSrc": "/cms/lib/NY50000157/Centricity/Domain/4/GuyThomas_563x563.jpg", "imageWidth": "563", "imageHeight": "563", "imageAltText": "Brewster Graduation, Guy Thomas", "isLinked": "False", "linkUrl": "", "linkText": "", "openLinkInNewWindow": "False", "videoLinkText": "", "videoIsEmbedded": "False", "videoIframe": "" }, { "flexDataId": "8552", "hideTitle": "False", "title": "Virginia Wheatley", "hideCaption": "False", "caption": "Virginia is a 2016 Brewster graduate.
She currently attends SUNY Morrisville and is majoring in Criminal Justice. She has been on the Dean's List every year, and the President's List in 2018.
Virginia belongs to the Criminal Justice Club and is also a member of the Morrisville Women's Basketball Team.", "imageSrc": "/cms/lib/NY50000157/Centricity/Domain/4/VirginiaWheatley_563x563.jpeg", "imageWidth": "563", "imageHeight": "563", "imageAltText": "2016 Brewster graduate, Virginia Wheatley", "isLinked": "False", "linkUrl": "", "linkText": "", "openLinkInNewWindow": "False", "videoLinkText": "", "videoIsEmbedded": "False", "videoIframe": "" }, { "flexDataId": "8489", "hideTitle": "False", "title": "Jessica Miele", "hideCaption": "False", "caption": "Jessica is a 2018 Brewster graduate.
She currently attends the Culinary Institute of America and is majoring in the Culinary Arts.
Jessica also works full-time as a chef.", "imageSrc": "/cms/lib/NY50000157/Centricity/Domain/4/JessicaMiele_563x563.jpeg", "imageWidth": "563", "imageHeight": "563", "imageAltText": "2018 Brewster graduate, Jessica Miele", "isLinked": "False", "linkUrl": "", "linkText": "", "openLinkInNewWindow": "False", "videoLinkText": "", "videoIsEmbedded": "False", "videoIframe": "" }, { "flexDataId": "8372", "hideTitle": "False", "title": "Sarah Mitchell", "hideCaption": "False", "caption": "Sarah is a 2016 Brewster graduate.
She is currently attending Oral Roberts University and is majoring in Music Education - Instrumental (Trumpet).
After graduating in May 2020, Sarah hopes to pursue further education with the Sight and Sound Conservatory where she will study acting and vocal technique. She hopes to one day become a full-time company performer with Sight and Sounds Theatres, as well as to direct school shows.", "imageSrc": "/cms/lib/NY50000157/Centricity/Domain/4/SarahMitchell_563x563.jpg", "imageWidth": "563", "imageHeight": "563", "imageAltText": "Sarah MItchell", "isLinked": "False", "linkUrl": "", "linkText": "", "openLinkInNewWindow": "False", "videoLinkText": "", "videoIsEmbedded": "False", "videoIframe": "" }, { "flexDataId": "8370", "hideTitle": "False", "title": "Jennifer Ghelarducci", "hideCaption": "False", "caption": "Jennifer is a 2016 Brewster graduate.
Jennifer graduated from the University of Rhode Island with a degree in Human Development and Family Studies. She is currently pursuing a Masters Degree in School Counseling at Providence College.
Jennifer also works part-time at a counseling center.", "imageSrc": "/cms/lib/NY50000157/Centricity/Domain/4/JenniferGhelarducci_563x563.jpg", "imageWidth": "563", "imageHeight": "563", "imageAltText": "Jennifer Ghelarducci", "isLinked": "False", "linkUrl": "", "linkText": "", "openLinkInNewWindow": "False", "videoLinkText": "", "videoIsEmbedded": "False", "videoIframe": "" }, { "flexDataId": "8369", "hideTitle": "False", "title": "Deanna Torrissi", "hideCaption": "False", "caption": "Deanna is a 2014 Brewster graduate.
She received a Bachelor's of Music Degree and an MAT Degree from Manhattanville College.
Deanna currently works as an Elementary School Music teacher in the Mahopac Central School District.", "imageSrc": "/cms/lib/NY50000157/Centricity/Domain/4/DeannaTorrissi_563x563.jpg", "imageWidth": "563", "imageHeight": "563", "imageAltText": "Deanna Torrissi", "isLinked": "False", "linkUrl": "", "linkText": "", "openLinkInNewWindow": "False", "videoLinkText": "", "videoIsEmbedded": "False", "videoIframe": "" }, { "flexDataId": "8268", "hideTitle": "False", "title": "Bryan Pryce", "hideCaption": "False", "caption": "Bryan is a 2004 Brewster graduate.
He is serving in the U.S. Marine Corps and works as an Air Traffic Control Systems Maintenance Chief.
Bryan has earned the Navy and Marine Corps Commendation Medal, and the Navy and Marine Corps Achievement Medal.
He has traveled the world, taught in Iraq during Operation Iraqi Freedom, and survived intense cold weather training.
Bryan credits his BHS teachers and coaches for molding him into the man he is today. Go Bears!", "imageSrc": "/cms/lib/NY50000157/Centricity/Domain/4/BryanPryce_563x563.jpg", "imageWidth": "563", "imageHeight": "563", "imageAltText": "Bryan Pryce", "isLinked": "False", "linkUrl": "", "linkText": "", "openLinkInNewWindow": "False", "videoLinkText": "", "videoIsEmbedded": "False", "videoIframe": "" }, { "flexDataId": "8042", "hideTitle": "False", "title": "Rebecca Rupolo", "hideCaption": "False", "caption": "Rebecca is a 2012 Brewster graduate.
She graduated from SUNY Fredonia with a Bachelor's Degree in Special Education and General Education Grades 1-6. In 2019 she received her Master's Degree in Literacy Birth-Grade 12.
She currently works as a Special Education Teacher at Jefferson Middle School in Jamestown, NY.", "imageSrc": "/cms/lib/NY50000157/Centricity/Domain/4/RebeccaRupolo_563x563.jpg", "imageWidth": "563", "imageHeight": "563", "imageAltText": "Rebecca Rupolo", "isLinked": "False", "linkUrl": "", "linkText": "", "openLinkInNewWindow": "False", "videoLinkText": "", "videoIsEmbedded": "False", "videoIframe": "" }, {}] };
